data.text:
Visit our hub, the perfect blend of cosmopolitan city and colonial wonder.
https://t.co/dgsaj2t9f9 https://t.co/eXbjoMqf5k
As part of our Health and Sanitization Management System, there is hand sanitizer available on all our flights. https://t.co/wcJ0KL0ecn https://t.co/8nNzjRA01j

Due to Canadian government regulations, all passengers must present a negative COVID-19 PCR test and download the app ArriveCAN to provide requested information.

Learn more: https://t.co/FgrdutuB0D https://t.co/HayXwu67lt
